item.title: Having trouble
item.dc:creator: @wixter wixter
item.description:
@wixter wrote:

jhon:

im partially sure it does the first one fine its just the 2nd one ill redo the coords or could you help me? i think i fucked the coords up any help? lol. Ok its deff the coords im not sure about the 5,5 bit its deff that part im sure about it

sorry it was my fault :S i used the +chr13)); which makes it press enter anyway here you go, iv used getcolor instead of findcolor to make it easiar for you iv tested this and it will log me into window messenger just make sure the email and password boxes are white, and you may haft to change the co-ords have any more problems just post back and il try to help
[scar]
program msnlogin;

Const
email = ‘emailhere’;
Password = ‘passwordhere’;

Var x,y : Integer;

Procedure email1;
Begin
if (getcolor(492, 209) =16777215) then
wait(500);
movemousesmooth(x,y)
wait(500);
clickmouse(x,y, true);
wait(500);
SendKeysSilent(email)
writeln(‘enterd email’);
end;

procedure password1;
Begin
if (getcolor(494, 250) =16777215) then
wait(500);
movemousesmooth(494, 250)
wait(500);
clickMouse(494, 250,true)
wait(500);
SendKeysSilent(password+chr(13));
writeln(‘enterd password’)
wait(1000);
end;

begin
email1;
password1;
end.[/scar]

item.title: Having trouble
item.dc:creator: @wixter wixter
item.description:
@wixter wrote:

ok theres just a few little things your doing wrong the first thing is that you have no need to declare username or password as a const because you arnt using them, you were using the sendkeys thing, so iv changed it so you can edit the email and password at the top and it will now type whatever the email or password is, also you were doing things like
[scar]movemousesmooth(x,y,1,1,true) [/scar]
this is only moving the mouse, not clicking it so we have no need for true or false and so it would be
[scar]movemousesmooth(x,y)[/scar]
and for
[scar]ClickMouse(208,207,1)[/scar]
we want it to click the mouse so we need either true or false so it would be
[scar]clickmouse(208, 207, true);[/scar]

anyway iv edited your script so hopefulyy it should work, iv also added waits and the writeln fuction to show when you enterd your email and password here you go should work now just edit the ‘emailhere’ and ‘password’ here for whatever you want it to be

[scar]program msnlogin;

Const
email = ‘emailhere’;
Password = ‘passwordhere’;

Var x,y : Integer;

Procedure email1;
Begin
if(Findcolor(x,y,15790320,5,5,208,207)) then
wait(500);
movemousesmooth(x,y)
wait(500);
clickmouse(460, 292, true);
wait(500);
SendKeysSilent(email+chr(13))
writeln(‘enterd email’);
end;

procedure password1;
Begin
if(Findcolor(x,y,15790320,5,5,958,304)) then
wait(500);
movemousesmooth(x,y)
wait(500);
clickMouse(x,y,true)
wait(500);
SendKeysSilent(password+chr(13));
writeln(‘enterd password’)
end;

begin
email1;
password1;
end.
[/scar]

Read full topic

item.title: Having trouble
item.dc:creator: @jhon jhon
item.description:
@jhon wrote:

hey guys im just getting lost with scar it says whenever i start the script 9:1 supposed to be a semicolon there [scar]program msnlogin;
Const
Username = ‘email’
Password = ‘password’

Var x,y : Integer;

Procedure email;
Begin
Findcolor(x,y,15790320,5,5,208,207)
movemousesmooth(x,y,1,1,true)
ClickMouse(208,207,1)
SendKeys(‘email’); // Email here
end;
procedure password;
Begin
Findcolor(x,y,15790320,5,5,958,304)
movemousesmooth(x,y,1,1,true)
ClickMouse(958,204,1)
SendKeys(‘password’); // Password here
end;
End.[/scar]
sorry guys i know i suck lol so dont flame at me quivers in fear Supposed to be an msn login thing for msn live oh and im not sure bout the const bit
oh crap i posted in the wrong section would someone move it plz? ty
